title: Failure to connect
body: I can get into the game and select a Champ but as soon as I am about to enter the rift is tells me "failure to connect" please check your internet connection and try again" I have done that restarted everything and uninstalled and reinstalled and nothing has changed can anyone help me fix this problem?

replies.body: Try updating a couple network settings really quick and testing this in a custom or practice game for me. Adjust your Port Forwarding and DNS settings by following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know how that works for ya.
This is exactly what i am going through right now with PBE. (https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nZl8Yogn-pbe)
